info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 1:57PM MDT until August 05 at 2:15PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM MDT FOR NORTHEASTERN ELBERT COUNTY... At 157 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles north of Ramah, or 29 miles west of Limon, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Agate. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
